page.shortlink: api desktop api import from quickbooks function
page.description: IMPORT_FROM_QUICKBOOKS() imports a table from QuickBooks and creates an Alpha table. IMPORT_FROM_QUICKBOOKS( ) is a part of QLinker, which is available as an optional add-in for Alpha Anywhere.
page.syntax: C Import_From_Quickbooks(C type ,C source_filename_or_dsn ,C table_to_create ,C sql_statement [,C password [,C user_name ]])

argument.name: source_filename_or_dsn
argument.description: Full filename and path of "qlinker.mdb" found in the "QLinker" folder under the Alpha installation directory.

argument.name: table_to_create
argument.description: Full filename and path of the Alpha table to create.

argument.name: sql_statement
argument.description: An SQL expression that selects the files to take from "qlinker.mdb" to create the new Alpha table. Character

argument.name: password
argument.description: Where required by QuickBooks: QuickBooks password. Character

argument.name: user_name
argument.description: Where required by QuickBooks: QuickBooks user name. Character

page.example: Import_From_Quickbooks("QUICKBOOKS","C:\Program Files\A5V5\QLinker\qlinker.mdb","C:\Databases\Expressions Test\Invoice.dbf","select refnumber , billaddress_city , billaddress_state , txndate from invoice","","") -> C:\Databases\Expressions Test\Invoice.dbf
